amendment.description: To authorize the donation of the SS Arthur M. Huddell to the Government of Greece.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4429 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4429 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Chafee. (consideration: CR S6377-6392; text: CR S6387) To authorize the donation of the SS Arthur M. Huddell to the Government of Greece.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4429 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Chafee.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4429 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
